events.message: I received my order last week but want to request a refund because the item does not meet my expectations.
The customer's message has been categorized under Refund based on their request to return the product and get money back.
The case has been assigned to agent Jamie for handling the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you'd like to request a refund for your recent order.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you want to return the item? This will help us process the refund faster.
My order number is 123456789. The item does not function as advertised and I am very disappointed with the quality.
We are sorry for the inconvenience. You can return the item within 14 days for a full refund. I will send the return shipping label to your email.
Thank you for the quick response and help. I appreciate the prompt refund option and the return shipping label.
The refund process is now initiated, and you will receive your money back once we receive the returned product.
Checking in to confirm if you have returned the item and if everything went smoothly with the refund process.
Yes, I sent the item back yesterday and I have already received the refund. Thank you for your excellent service.
The refund case has been closed as the customer has confirmed receipt of their refund and is satisfied with the resolution.
